reviews.review_msg: Absolutely amazing Professor. Very practical, knowledgeable and makes everything relatable to today's world.  Fair and understanding. I'm a mature student and she was my very first professor. I have finished all my HR courses, I wish I could go back and retake her class just to pick up on everything I missed the first time around!

Kathryn knows her stuff. The midterm is quite hard. Be ready to memorize and be able to apply 7-8 chapters. The multiple choice was super easy, but the written part was difficult. 4 questions @ 10 points each to be written in 45 minutes.  She marks tough, if you do not answer the questions completely you will get a zero on the written part.

I found Sarb to be awesome! She provides inspirational material in class and I am quite engaged in her class. She is a fair grader, and I find she stays on topic with class discussions. I would definitely take another class of hers.

One of the best professors I've ever had in my entire life. You can tell he genuinely likes no only the subject but teaching in general. His style of teaching set the bar so high for my other professors, I doubt anyone will ever come close to him. He truly cares about his students. The way he teaches, you really understand the subject thoroughly.
